Sentencas: Understanding material properties of CeO2 nanoparticles of different sizes is very important for its further applications in the field of catalysis used in solid-oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Structural Properties of (CeO2)n (n=1-5) Nanoparticle: Molecular Mechanics and First Principle Studies

Sentencas: In this study, the fast inertial relaxation engine (FIRE) algorithm combined with the simulated annealing method was firstly employed to find the structures of (CeO2)(n) (n = 1 - 5) with global minimum potential energy.
Titulo: Structural Properties of (CeO2)n (n=1-5) Nanoparticle: Molecular Mechanics and First Principle Studies

Sentencas: These structures were further refined by the density functional theory ( DFT) simulation in order to deeply understand their structural properties.
Titulo: Structural Properties of (CeO2)n (n=1-5) Nanoparticle: Molecular Mechanics and First Principle Studies
